summary: A SweetFX preset that aims to saturate the dull world of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Latest Version: 1.01

Next Version 1.1
What this will include: A custom shader, and I might bring bloom back as a  separate release.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Includes:

Vibrancy - This settings saturates the world of Skyrim.

Dither- Simulates more colors than your monitor can display (This shouldn't be a problem if you're using a half-decent monitor, but I've kept it enabled for people who have their crappy integrated laptop display (which applies to me...)

The High quality preset adds:
FXAA- A type of anti-aliasing that makes jagged lines smoother

HDR- A rendering method for images. A combination of over and underexposed images.I personally recommend it, if you have the hardware. (Unfortunately, SweetFX doesn't support real HDR, so they replaced it with a function that  kind of looks like HDR)

IMPORTANT: If you look at the permissions tab, you will notice that under something along the lines of "Users can convert my file so that it works on similar games". It says that you will require permission to do that. YOU DO NOT NEED MY PERMISSION!!! That was simply the only option available.

Hope you enjoy the mod :)
author: ForbiddenSword
